name: Bon Armppetit
description:
Left with only an arm, you must platform through the wastes and eat the bosses of the food crime underworld. Quite hard IMO. 

I hope u enjoy

CONTROLS:

mouse - arm.left click-grab.r-restart

made in 3 days for GMQ?? 3 so probably a bit glitchy. my first game jam. Gamemaker1.4
